title: iPhone Air designer Abidur Chowdhury leaves Apple just months after launch, looks towards future in AI
description: Abidur Chowdhury, the industrial designer prominent for introducing the iPhone Air during Apple’s September 2025 event, has left the company to join an artificial intelligence startup.
content: Abidur Chowdhury, the designer who narrated the design video of the iPhone Air at Apple’s September event, has left the company to join an artificial intelligence startup. According to Bloomberg, his exit has “made waves” inside Apple, following his ... [3050 chars]

title: Homture Launches the Magic Frame - Bringing Memories to Life
description: SAN MATEO, Calif., Nov. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Homture, a rising innovator in smart home and AI lifestyle technology, proudly announces the global launch of the Homture Magic Frame, a next-generation digital photo frame that brings memories to life. Powered by advanced artificial intelligence, the device restores old photos, animates still portraits, and instantly connects families across any distance.
content: SAN MATEO, Calif., Nov. 18, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Homture, a rising innovator in smart home and AI lifestyle technology, proudly announces the global launch of the Homture Magic Frame, a next-generation digital photo frame that brings memories to ... [4668 chars]

title: Peter Thiel’s hedge fund offloads $100m stake in AI chips giant Nvidia
description: Peter Thiel's hedge fund Thiel Macro LLC sold its stake in Nvidia during the third quarter, marking yet another retreat from investments in the world's leading provider of artificial-intelligence chips.
content: The fund offloaded its entire position of 537,742 shares in the California-based chipmaker, which would have been worth about $100m (€86m) based on the closing price from September 30. The Thiel Macro fund now counts Apple, Microsoft and a reduced st... [2385 chars]

title: Alphabet shares hit record after Berkshire makes rare tech bet with $4.9 billion stake
description: Alphabet shares rallied nearly 6% to a record high on Monday after Berkshire Hathaway’s new stake provided an endorsement of the tech giant’s artificial intelligence efforts.
content:
Alphabet shares rallied nearly 6% to a record high on Monday after Berkshire Hathaway’s new stake provided an endorsement of the tech giant’s artificial intelligence efforts amid heightened worries over a looming bubble.
